page.title: 19LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: There is evidence of{stone_age}tribes within the area as{flint axes}have been found,together with unnatural mounds which although they have not been fully investigated are probably {tumuli. Also signs of an earth{fort}exist which could be from the{Stone}or {Bronze age. Pieces of{Roman pottery}have been uncovered together with{oyster shells and{coins.Oysters}were eaten by the {Legionaries. Other signs of{Roman}presence are the remains of a{Roman road}stretching to the{S.W.}through Bradley Wood.However, most of this land has been farmed and so only a few bricks remain. It is also believed that the foundations of{Bradley House Farm are those of a house mentioned in the original{Domesday Book.
